workExpList.work_desc: Undergraduate Research Assistant. Lead the development of RADICaL 1p, a novel deep learning model to infer neural population dynamics from noisy one-photon calcium imaging data. Coordinate the lab's collaboration with experimental labs on calcium imaging experiments. Perform Tensorflow 1 to Tensorflow 2 migration on lab's previous projects.

Research Intern. Developed a comparative analysis pipeline for synchronous one-photon calcium imaging data and animal behavior data with CaImAn and DeepLabCut. Upgrade the internet infrastructure of data storage and transform among labs.

Software Engineer Intern in cloud computing. Maintained the voice cloud database of Iflytek under the structure of Hadoop and Scala-based Apache Spark, responded to the demand of mass voice data extraction and developed a a self-service voice data extraction platform for the company's research and business departments based on Apache Zeppelin.
